content:
balance as at 30 September 2022 CNY738.0K of utilities paid on behalf of Haining Wanpu
As indicated by management, the Target accrued 6.9% bad debt provision for utilities receivables aged within 1 year.

SUMMARY: Used entity 'Haining Wanpu' with amounts: CNY738.0K (utilities paid), CNY51.0K (provision), total CNY687.0K. Bad debt provision percentage calculated as (51/738)*100=6.9%.
